title: PM condoles death of secretary interior
content:
ISLAMABAD, Sep 6 (APP):Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar Wednesday condoled the demise of federal secretary interior Abdullah Khan Sumbal.
In a message, he prayed Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant patience to the bereaved family to bear the loss with fortitude.
He said Abdulllah Khan Sunbal was a very capable officer and his services for the country were exemplary.
His demise was a huge loss for the civil service of Pakistan, he added.
